title: [求一个1.6.2的qs商店插件]
author: woshig
txt_content: 我开了一个1.6.2的服务器 那些在我服务器里玩的人要什么qs商店哪位大神有的话 就给我一个吧{:10_562:}

replies.author: woshig
woshig
replies.txt_content:
BYLove160 发表于 2015-1-27 11:11
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=337437 望采纳
问一下 怎么安装？？？？？？

replies.author: BYLove160
replies.txt_content:
woshig 发表于 2015-1-27 11:17
问一下 怎么安装？？？？？？
放到服务器里的plugins 文件夹里

replies.author: BYLove160
replies.txt_content:
/manngaddp builder quickshop.use
/manngaddp builder quickshop.create.sell 
/manngaddp builder quickshop.create.buy
/manngaddp builder quickshop.create.double
然后依次输入这些指令 就能正常运行了

replies.author: woshig
replies.txt_content:
BYLove160 发表于 2015-1-27 11:28
/manngaddp builder quickshop.use
/manngaddp builder quickshop.create.sell 
/manngaddp builder quicks ...
3q MCBBS有你更精彩
